posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Fullmer/Tucker Baltimore 2-Player Horizontal Card
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
$650 shipped or best offer.  Card probably has a technical grade of EX, but is a touch light (not too bad).  Rare item which books for over 3K in the SCD Guide Book.[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1136845855.JPG[/IMG]
